properties.name: Angelica Kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  300 East 12th St.Organic, vegan food made with ingredients from local farms and producers. They participate in composting programs.

properties.name: Babycakes NYC
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  248 Broome St, New York, NYTheir organic cupcakes are made without eggs, dairy, wheat or gluten, and yes, they are delicious!

properties.name: Back Forty
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  190 Avenue B, new york, nyLocal and seasonal food served at large farm tables. The bar is constructed with reclaimed wood. They participate in biodiesel recycling programs. Outdoor dining available here.

properties.name: Black Iron Burger Shop
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene 540 East 5th Street, new york, nyClassic burger joint and pub with food prepared with ingredients from local, organic farms.

properties.name: Blossom Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  466 Columbus Avenue, new york,nyVegan cuisine with organic, locally grown ingredients.

properties.name: Blossom Vegan Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  187 9th Ave, New York, NYVegan food made with organic produce and other organic ingredients. They have a large selection of all organic wine and beer.

properties.name: Blue Hill
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  75 Washington Pl, New York, NYSeasonal American cuisine with ingredients from Blue Hill at Stone Barns farm, as well as other local Hudson Valley farms. They participate in biodiesel recycling and composting programs. It is housed in a landmark New York City speakeasy.

properties.name: Bonobos Vegetarian
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  18 E 23rd St, , NYVegan, raw cuisine with organic ingredients. They participate in composting programs.

properties.name: Cafe Habana
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  17 Prince St., New York, NY, 10012Central Mexican and Cuban influenced Latin cuisine made with many locally sourced, sustainably grown ingredients. To-go cafe next door.

properties.name: Cafe Lalo
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  201 W. 83rd St., New York, NYFrench cafe with organic menu items, organic pastries and desserts, fair trade and organic coffee and tea. They participate in composting programs.

properties.name: Candle 79
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  154 East 79th Street, New York, NY, 10021Upscale vegan menu with food made with local, seasonal, and organic ingredients. They participate in composting programs.

properties.name: Chanterelle
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  2 harrison st new york, new yorkTraditional French cuisine featuring organic meat and seafood dishes, other organic ingredients. Participates in biodiesel recycling program.

properties.name: City Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene    223 First Avenue, New york, nyFantastic cookies! The store\'s walls are made of wheat, their cups are made of corn, their shelves are made of 100% recycled paper, they are wind powered, and their baked goods are delivered to them in bicycle-driven cargo rickshaws. This list goes on and on! Their ginger cookies are a must try.

properties.name: Community food and Juice
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  2893 Broadway, new york, nyRestaurant and cafe serving seasonal cuisine prepared with organic ingredients from local farms and Greenmarkets. They ha fair trade coffee, organic juice bar. Their dining tables are made from reclaimed wood.

properties.name: Cookshop
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  156 10 Ave, new york, nySeasonal American cuisine made with ingredients from city\'s Greenmarkets, sustainably raised meats. Participates in biodiesel recycling and composting programs. Outdoor dining available.

properties.name: CornerShop
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  643 Broadway, NY 10012American food made with mostly organic ingredients, They have organic coffee and biodynamic wines. They participate in biodiesel recycling programs.

properties.name: Counter
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  105 1st Ave, New York, NYFrench-Mediterranean bistro and wine and martini bar with organic vegetarian and vegan food. Their ingredients come from local, organic farmers, artisans, and wine makers. They have over 300 organic and biodynamic wines.

properties.name: Del Posto
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  85 10th Avenue, new york, nyItalian menu with local, seasonal food prepared with some organic ingredients. They participate in composting and biodiesel recycling programs. They have live music some evenings.

properties.name: Friend of A Farmer
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  77 Irving Pl, New York, NYRestaurant serving home-style cuisine made with seasonal ingredients, specializing in handmade breads, muffins, pastries, and pies .

properties.name: Gizzi's Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  16 West 8th Street, new york, nyOrganic, fair trade coffee and tea place serving salads, sandwiches, and bakery items made with mostly organic ingredients. They have some vegetarian and vegan choices. They have live music Friday and Saturday nights.

properties.name: Grounded
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  28 Jane St, New York, NYNeighborhood coffeehouse with organic, fair trade coffee and loose tea. They have locally sourced, organic dairy products and baked goods. They also have free Wi-Fi.

properties.name: Jack's Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene 138 W 10th St, New York, NYCoffee shop with fair trade, organic, shade-grown coffee, with dairy products from a local Hudson Valley cooperative. They have locally made baked goods.

properties.name: Quantum Leap
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  203 1st Ave, new york, nyVegan and vegetarian cuisine made with organic ingredients. They participate in biodiesel recycling.

properties.name: Sacred Chow
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene   277 Sullivan Street, new york, nyVegan bistro serving all organic cuisine, with mostly local ingredients. Organic beer, wine, and herbal teas.

properties.name: Sons and Daughters
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  35 Avenue A, New York, NYThis store sells organic clothing for children, baby slings, and a big selection of non-toxic wooden toys.

properties.name: Teany Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene   90 Rivington Street, NEW YORK, NY, 10002-2205Cafe serving organic vegetarian and vegan cuisine with more than 95 tea varieties. Many are organic and fair trade. They participate in composting and biodiesel recycling programs.

properties.name: The Green Bean Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene   1431 York Avenue, new york, nyNeighborhood cafe with vegetarian and vegan dishes made with organic ingredients. They have fair trade, organic coffee and tea.

properties.name: The Green Table
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  75 9th Ave, New York, NYSeasonal food with organic and locally sourced ingredients; organic wines and beers. The bar is made from reclaimed wood. They participate in composting programs.

properties.name: The Organic Grill
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene   123 First Ave, , NYOrganic ingredients from local and artisinal producers; and mostly vegetarian dishes and some wild-caught seafood.

properties.name: The Perfect Food Slice
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  1413 2nd ave, new york,nyPizza made with all-natural, organic ingredients with some vegan and gluten-free choices.

properties.name: Trader Joe's
properties.description: Posted by Tryingtobegreene  142 East 14th Street, new york, NYThis is a great supermarket that has organic fresh and frozen fruits and veggies, bread, snacks, dairy, household items, prepared foods - you name it! All reasonably priced too! They have wine next door as well.
